channel.title: Comments on: This is the laptop I dream of
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Angel Girl
item.dc:creator: Angel Girl
item.description: Hi, I just got one and yes, it rocks. ;o) RH9 loaded like a dream, and I'm having a few problems with X and getting the display stable, but other than that, it really is a sweet machine. (Surprisingly, I had no trouble getting the wireless lan to work.) This weekend: getting the dock to work with my liux desktop. :oP
item.content:encoded: Hi, I just got one and yes, it rocks. ;o) RH9 loaded like a dream, and I’m having a few problems with X and getting the display stable, but other than that, it really is a sweet machine. (Surprisingly, I had no trouble getting the wireless lan to work.) This weekend: getting the dock to work with my liux desktop. :oP
